argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y z

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_cnex | |- CC e. _V |
| 2 |  | #P_axaddf | |- + : ( CC X. CC ) --> CC |
| 3 |  | #P_addass | |- ( ( x e. CC /\ y e. CC /\ z e. CC ) -> ( ( x + y ) + z ) = ( x + ( y + z ) ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_0cn | |- 0 e. CC |
| 5 |  | #P_addid2 | |- ( x e. CC -> ( 0 + x ) = x ) |
| 6 |  | #P_negcl | |- ( x e. CC -> -u x e. CC ) |
| 7 |  | #P_addcom | |- ( ( x e. CC /\ -u x e. CC ) -> ( x + -u x ) = ( -u x + x ) ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_mpdan | |- ( x e. CC -> ( x + -u x ) = ( -u x + x ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_negid | |- ( x e. CC -> ( x + -u x ) = 0 ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_eqtr3d | |- ( x e. CC -> ( -u x + x ) = 0 ) |
| 11 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 10 | #P_isgrpoi | |- + e. GrpOp |
| 12 | 2 | #P_fdmi | |- dom + = ( CC X. CC ) |
| 13 |  | #P_addcom | |- ( ( x e. CC /\ y e. CC ) -> ( x + y ) = ( y + x ) ) |
| 14 | 11, 12, 13 | #P_isabloi | |- + e. AbelOp |
